short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the gist of it all with GPT summaries - the ultimate Chrome extension for efficient online experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'CognitionX' revolutionizes the way you search for information online. With this extension, you'll be able to see GPT summaries right alongside your Google search results and YouTube videos.

The CognitionX summaries are generated by a state-of-the-art language model, trained to provide the most accurate and concise summaries of any given text. With this extension, you'll be able to quickly and easily get the gist of any article, blog post, or video without having to read or watch the entire thing.

With CognitionX, you'll save time, improve your research efficiency, and gain a deeper understanding of the topics you're interested in. So why wait? Download our extension today and start enjoying a more efficient and productive online experience!
